Name: Tom Gardiner
Job/Team Function: The Delivery Department helps to bring forward key regeneration sites, buildings and projects for optimal sustainable use and re-development and are responsible for the management of regeneration projects, the community fund and the economic development strategy. More details on the Delivery Departments work can be found in key projects.
Parent Department: Department for Communities and Local Government

Name: Niall Lindsay
Job/Team Function: CEO and Accounting Officer of Corporation
Parent Department: Department for Communities and Local Government

Name: Peter Bassett
Job/Team Function: The Planning Department has responsibility for strategic level planning decisions for Thurrock plus the authority for planning decisions on listed buildings. More details can be found on the Corporations planning team, functions and responsibilities in Planning.
Parent Department: Department for Communities and Local Government

Name: Sean O'Donnell
Job/Team Function: The Resources Department consists of teams in Information, Communications and Technology, Finance and Procurement, Legal, Compliance and Governance, Human Resources, Committee Management and the Purfleet Centre project. It is the responsibility of the Resources Department to ensure that the support functions are in place to enable Planning and Delivery to fulfil their roles.
Parent Department: Department for Communities and Local Government
